mapper.sql: t1.id, t1.publish_user_id, t1.publish_user_name, t1.publish_user_mobile, t1.auto_info_name, t1.store_id,t1.store_name, t1.source_type, t1.views, t1.publish_time, t1.report_score, t1.report_colligation_ranks,t1.report_servicing_ranks, t1.report_time, t1.`status`, t1.car_auto_no, t1.main_photo, t1.if_new, t1.create_user, t1.create_time, t1.update_user, t1.update_time, t1.auction_num, t1.region_id,t1.auto_auction_id,t1.transfer_flag
mapper.select: select count(t1.id) from car_auto t1 WHERE t1.status != '0'
select , t2.auction_start_time FROM car_auto t1 left join car_auto_auction t2 on t1.auto_auction_id = t2.id WHERE t1.`status` != '0' AND t1.id = #{id}
SELECT t1.id FROM car_auto t1

select t1.`status`, t1.main_photo, t1.auto_info_name, t2.starting_price, t3.transaction_fee, t3.create_time, t4.user_name AS publish_user_name, t1.create_time AS publish_time, t2.auction_end_time, t2.auction_start_time, t1.id, t1.car_auto_no, t8.msg logMsg from car_auto t1 left join car_auto_auction t2 on t2.id = t1.auto_auction_id left join car_order t3 on t3.auto_auction_id = t1.auto_auction_id left join car_manager_user t4 on t1.create_user = t4.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT t5.msg, t5.time, t5.auto_id, t5.`status` FROM car_auto_log t5 INNER JOIN (SELECT MAX(t6.time) time,t6.auto_id FROM car_auto_log t6 GROUP BY t6.auto_id) t7 ON t7.auto_id = t5.auto_id AND t7.time=t5.time WHERE t5.status='3' ORDER BY t5.time desc ) t8 ON t1.id = t8.auto_id WHERE t1.status != '0' AND ((t1.status='1' AND t1.create_user=#{managerId}) OR t1.status != '1')
AND t1.store_id=#{storeId}
AND t4.department_id=#{departmentId}
AND (t1.auto_info_name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{autoInfoName}),'%') OR t1.car_auto_no = #{autoInfoName})
AND (t1.status = '6' OR t1.status = '7') ORDER BY t2.auction_start_time DESC
AND (t1.status = '16' OR t1.status = '17')
AND (t1.status = '1' OR t1.status = '2' OR t1.status = '3' OR t1.status = '4' OR t1.status = '5')
AND (t1.status = '8' OR t1.status = '9' OR t1.status = '10' OR t1.status = '11' OR t1.status = '12' OR t1.status = '14' OR t1.status = '15')
AND (t1.status = '18' OR t1.status = '19')
AND (t1.status = '1' OR t1.status = '3' OR t1.status = '18' OR t1.status = '19')
order by t1.update_time desc
order by t1.create_time desc
limit #{startRowNum,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{endRowNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select count(1) from car_auto t1 left join car_auto_auction t2 on t2.id = t1.auto_auction_id left join car_order t3 on t3.auto_auction_id = t1.auto_auction_id left join car_manager_user t4 on t1.create_user = t4.id WHERE t1.status != '0' AND ((t1.status='1' AND t1.create_user=#{managerId}) OR t1.status != '1')
AND t1.store_id=#{storeId}
AND t4.department_id=#{departmentId}
AND (t1.auto_info_name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{autoInfoName}),'%') OR t1.car_auto_no = #{autoInfoName})
AND (t1.status = '6' OR t1.status = '7')
AND (t1.status = '16' OR t1.status = '17')
AND (t1.status = '1' OR t1.status = '2' OR t1.status = '3' OR t1.status = '4' OR t1.status = '5')
AND (t1.status = '8' OR t1.status = '9' OR t1.status = '10' OR t1.status = '11' OR t1.status = '12' OR t1.status = '14' OR t1.status = '15')
AND (t1.status = '18' OR t1.status = '19')
AND (t1.status = '1' OR t1.status = '3' OR t1.status = '18' OR t1.status = '19')

select t1.id, t1.car_auto_no, t1.auto_info_name, t2.starting_price, t2.reserve_price, t3.begin_register_date, t1.source_type, t1.auction_num, t1.publish_user_name, t2.auction_type, t3.license_number, t1.store_name storeName from car_auto t1 left join car_auto_auction t2 on t2.id=t1.auto_auction_id left join car_auto_info_detail t3 on t3.auto_id=t1.id where t2.auction_type='2' and t1.status='5' AND t1.status != '0'
AND (t1.auto_info_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{searchParam}),'%') or t1.car_auto_no like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{searchParam}),'%'))

SELECT count(1) FROM ( SELECT count(1) FROM car_auto t1 INNER JOIN car_auto_log t2 ON t1.id = t2.auto_id WHERE ( t2.`status` = 2 OR t2.`status` = 4 ) AND t2.user_id = '19' GROUP BY t1.id ) t WHERE 1 = 1

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT t1.auto_info_name, t1.main_photo, t2.time, t1.id, t1.`status`, t1.transfer_flag, caa.auction_type, cmu.user_name log_user_name FROM car_auto t1 INNER JOIN car_auto_log t2 ON t1.id = t2.auto_id INNER JOIN car_auto_auction caa ON caa.id = t1.auto_auction_id INNER JOIN car_manager_user cmu ON cmu.id = t1.create_user WHERE ( t2.`status` = 2 OR t2.`status` = 4 ) AND t2.user_id = '19' ORDER BY t2.time DESC ) t WHERE 1 = 1 GROUP BY t.id
limit #{startRowNum,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{endRowNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}

SELECT count(t1.id) FROM car_auto t1 INNER JOIN car_auto_auction caa ON caa.id = t1.auto_auction_id INNER JOIN car_manager_user cmu ON cmu.id = t1.create_user
INNER JOIN car_store cs ON cs.id = cmu.department_id INNER JOIN car_manager_role_publish cmrp ON cmrp.obj_id = cs.region_id
INNER JOIN car_manager_role_publish cmrp ON cmrp.obj_id = cmu.department_id
WHERE (t1.`status` = 2 OR t1.`status` = 4 ) and caa.auction_type = #{auctionType} and cmrp.type_id = #{auctionType} and cmrp.manager_id = #{userId}

SELECT t1.id, t1.auto_info_name, t1.main_photo, t1.update_time, cmu.user_name log_user_name, t1.`status`, t1.transfer_flag, caa.auction_type FROM car_auto t1 INNER JOIN car_auto_auction caa ON caa.id = t1.auto_auction_id INNER JOIN car_manager_user cmu ON cmu.id = t1.create_user
INNER JOIN car_store cs ON cs.id = cmu.department_id INNER JOIN car_manager_role_publish cmrp ON cmrp.obj_id = cs.region_id
INNER JOIN car_manager_role_publish cmrp ON cmrp.obj_id = cmu.department_id
WHERE (t1.`status` = 2 OR t1.`status` = 4 ) and caa.auction_type = #{auctionType} and cmrp.type_id = #{auctionType} and cmrp.manager_id = #{userId} ORDER BY t1.update_time DESC
limit #{startRowNum,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{endRowNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}
